name: Liad, Child of Pasa of Melos

traits.abilities: is hardy, hale, and healthy, but is feeble and scrawny

personality.mannerism: Constantly reminds the person speaking to them that their child is a strong adventurer too

voice.vocals: Speaks Slowly, at a High pitch.
voice.quirk: Heavy lisp on Th and S (th-ufferin th-uckertash!)
